title: Game Freezes Early Game [CRASH]
body: Since the latest update, I have had my game freeze indefinitely early-game every single time I play. I have tried updating my computer software and drivers, restarting both my computer and the LOL client, even uninstalled and reinstalled the client, but it still happens. I've seen other people complain about this issue as well. When it freezes, the only way to get back in the game is to force the game to close and reconnect. Once I reconnect it will not freeze again. Every time. This can seriously impede my game play and has costed me many losses. PLEASE FIX ASAP

replies.body: Same happens to me after like 6-10 min, every match made game
Issue should be resolved now (you won't need to do anything, just play as you normally would).  If the issue is still occurring please let me know.
